A Seasonable prospect for the view and consideration of Christians being a brief representation of the lives and conversations of infidels and heathens, in our age, as to religion and morality : together with some reflections thereupon, in relation to us who profess Christianity : to which is now added many of the wise and vertuous sayings of the ancient heathens / by a gentleman. Gentleman.
The second edition.
[4], 54 p.
Printed by J.L. for Luke Meredith ..., London : 1691.
Errata on p. 54. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======

Gentleman.
